hours: The club is open Monday to Friday from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
pool_hours: The pool is available daily from 6:00 AM to 9:30 PM. Last entry is 45 minutes before closing.
sauna_hours: The sauna area is open from 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM on weekdays and from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM on weekends.
kids_zone: The Kids Zone is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
membership_price: Monthly membership starts at 139 PLN. Quarterly and annual plans are also available.
classes_booking: Group classes can be booked through our app or by contacting the front desk.
classes_cancellation: Classes can be cancelled no later than 2 hours before they start. After that, a fee applies.
parking: Members get 2 hours of free parking. Please take a ticket at the entrance.
personal_trainer: You can schedule a personal training session at the front desk or directly with your chosen trainer.
contract_freeze: The contract can be frozen once a year for up to 30 days. The cost of freezing is 29 PLN.
contract_termination: Contract termination requires signing a form at the front desk. The notice period is 1 month.
wifi: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the club. Network name: FITNESS_WIFI, password: trening2024.
towels: Towels are available at the front desk for an additional fee of 5 PLN.
locker_room: Lockers operate with a PIN code. If you forget your code, please contact the front desk.
lost_items: Lost items can be collected at the front desk. We keep them for 30 days.
rules: The club's rules are available on our website and at the front desk.
app_help: If you're having issues with the mobile app, try updating it to the latest version or contact the front desk.
payments: We accept card payments, BLIK, and recurring payments.
maintenance: Current maintenance and area closures are posted on the information board at the entrance and in the app.
faq_no_info: Unfortunately, I couldn't find an answer to that question. Can I help you with something else?
